collection_holder_name: Southern Historical Collection, University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill
pageContext.collection_title: WEED Radio Station, Rocky Mount, NC
pageContext.collection_description: Includes correspondence and other files of WEED, Rocky Mount, NC and scattered files of WBAR, Bartow, FL, both of which were owned by William Avera Wynne. The WEED files include program logs, channel surveys and communications with the FCC and both the NBC and ABC radio network offices.
